reviewText: Fantastic Series! Well worth the cost of Brit Box.
I love this show-- please get series 6!!
Great series but I bought the wrong area.  It doesn't work in the United States.

If you haven't seen this British comedy/drama series let me say it is a must see!  This is the season two edition.  There are currently three seasons available for the American viewing public.  Seasons four and the final season five are not yet distributed in the format for American dvd players.

I love the British series Cold Feet.  I started watching it when it was being shown on Bravo! a few years back.  All of the seasons (or series)are well-written and acted, and the second one is no exception. Infidelity, crushes on friends, pregnancy, rekindlings of romance, job loss and serious illness are just a few of the topics that are tackled in the second series of this witty, smart and sexy drama.  I can't wait until the rest of the seasons are released on DVD here in the US!
